import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import ReviewList from'../components/ReviewList';import ReviewForm from'../components/ReviewForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RestaurantDetail(){const{id}=useParams();const[restaurant,setRestaurant]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/restaurants/${id}`).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setRestaurant(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(()=>setLoading(false));},[id]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-10",children:"Loading..."});if(!restaurant)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-10 text-red-500",children:"Restaurant not found."});// For refreshing reviews after submission
const[refreshReviews,setRefreshReviews]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-3xl mx-auto mt-10 bg-white rounded-xl shadow p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-48 w-full bg-gray-200 rounded mb-6 flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden",children:restaurant.image?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:restaurant.image,alt:restaurant.name,className:"object-cover w-full h-48"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-400",children:"Image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-red-500 mb-2",children:restaurant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mb-4",children:restaurant.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2",children:"Menu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"space-y-2",children:restaurant.menu&&restaurant.menu.length>0?restaurant.menu.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"flex justify-between border-b py-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-red-500 font-semibold",children:["\u20B9",item.price]})]},idx)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"text-gray-400",children:"No menu items available."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReviewForm,{restaurantId:id,onReviewAdded:()=>setRefreshReviews(r=>!r)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReviewList,{restaurantId:id},refreshReviews)]})]});}export default RestaurantDetail;
